channel.title: Policy Gradient Method on Blanket
channel.description: Recent content in Policy Gradient Method on Blanket

item.title: Policy Gradient Methods for Reinforcement Learning With Function Approximation (1999)
item.description: Policy gradient methods approximate stochastic policies using function approximators, which are independent of value functions. They update the policies according to the gradient of expected reward with respect to the policy parameters. Policy Gradient Methods for Reinforcement Learning With Function Approximation shows that a form of policy iteration with function approximation converges to a locally optimal policy.
